transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Mr. Rajesh?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Yeah hi Rajesh, a very good afternoon. Main Rishta Aggarwal baat kar rahi hu sir IndiaMART se. I am the senior manager here for.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Haan Rajesh ji aapka catalog hamare saath running hai na sir?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Haan. To sir matlab main ye dekh rahi thi ki ye service matlab aapne last year November mein aapne iska registration karaya tha. To it's been an year now sir. To humse total experience like ek saal ka aapka kaisa experience raha sir?
Customer: Worst experience sir.
Executive: Worst experience. Okay.

Executive: To aapka ek feedback bhi tha jo abhi aapne 6 tarikh ko pin kiya tha IndiaMART ko ki fake promises only to sell their software and after you are ready to experience worst service of your life.
Customer: Yes yes yes.
Executive: Right sir. So.
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Thik hai. To aapne to matlab kis tarah ka aapko sir problem kya jo lead aati hai uski quality kharab hai?
Customer: Madam.
Executive: Ya kya wo kya problem hai sir?
Customer: Lead ki quality wo to wo to ek alag cheez ho gayi. Maine kitni complaint kiya, kitni baar wo kiya. Koi response nahi, koi uska solution nahi. Aaj tak ek problem meri uska solution nahi mila. Lead milna aur wo to ek bhool hi jaaiye aap ki isse koi business mera ho paya ho.
Customer: Wo to ek bilkul hi next cheez ho gayi. Yaha pe to aapki koi sunwai nahi hoti. Ek baar unhone aapko wo bech diya. Uske baad mein aapko aapke haal pe chhod diya ki lead aa rahi hai aapko 250 gram ki.
Customer: Aap keh rahe hain ki mere ko 25 ton ki kam se kam lead aani chahiye. Wo 250 gram ki lead aa rahi hai. Matlab koi bhi aapne kitni bhi problem aap kijiye. Koi lead agar aati hai 50 ton ki, turant expire ho jati hai. Turant aap usko within ek second ke andar agar aap click karenge to wo expire ho jati hai. Matlab wo use kar li. Fir kya fayda hua usko lene ka? Agar lead aayi aur wo main dekh hi nahi paya usse pehle hi wo wo ho jaye. Fir kya fayda uska?
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Kya service hai ye?
Executive: Sir main na. Haan haan. Sir main aapko. Is tarah kuch categories hai, kuch products aise hai jo ki na jaha pe na demand bahut jyada hai. To jaise hi lead aati hai na kyunki isme dekhiye aur bhi suppliers hai.
Customer: Madam.
Executive: Ab aap sir mobile app use karte hai na jab lead consume karte hai.
Customer: Madam madam madam aap ek second. Aap mere ko ek cheez bataiye yaha pe kya matlab ye KBC ho raha hai ki aap kitna jaldi buzzer dabate hai?
Customer: Within second aapko koi lead message notification aaya aapne open kiya itna to time lagega aapko nahi lagega?
Executive: Sir main.
Customer: Wo aap dekhte ho to wo expire ho jati hai. Nahi agar aapke paas mein bahut jyada customers hai, bahut jyada wo hai to fir aap itne logo ko bechte kyun ho usko?
Customer: Aap paanch logo ko bechiye na agar aapki capacity paanch logo ko provide karwane ki hai service.
Executive: Sir isliye dekhiye in fact humne to aapka competition kam kar diya. Pehle jo leads jaati thi aath nau logo ko jaati thi ab to khud chaar ya paanch mein jaati hai.
Customer: Main kya keh raha hu, main kya keh raha hu madam. Main ye keh raha hu ki agar aapke paas service nahi hai dene ke liye to aap fake promises kyun karte hai?
Executive: Fake promise matlab jaise sir promise ki.
Customer: Bilkul fake promise.
Customer: Mere se ye kaha gaya tha ki agar aap iski usse santusht nahi hai do mahine ke aap return kar sakte hai. Aapka paisa aapko milega. Aapko ek manager milega jo aapka within jab bhi aap call karenge to aapko wo ek manager assign ho jayega jo ki aapki koi bhi query hogi, koi bhi problem hogi usko solution karega. Thik hai aapke manager jo hai usko hazaro baar aapne phone milaya but wo phone nahi uthate. Thik hai. Koi problem aapne batai uska koi solution nahi. Madam bata raha hu na main mera feedback suniye na aapke kehne se kya hai. Thik hai. Uska koi solution nahi milta ki aapne koi problem batai hai uska koi wo milna chahiye. Koi lead aati hai wo turant expire ho jati hai. Aapse relevant aapko koi lead nahi milti. Jo aapne category select hi nahi ki hai uski lead aati hai. Jo quantity select nahi ki uski lead aati hai. Thik hai. To matlab ek bhi cheez to aisi nahi hai na jo aapke usme ho ki aapne wo promise kiya aur wo aap fulfill kar rahe ho. Mere se kaha gaya tha ki do mahine ke andar agar aapko koi business nahi milta hai ya wo nahi hota hai jisse aap service se santusht nahi hote hai to aapka with aapko do mahine mein money back hoga. Main pehle maine unse kaha ki sir aapne jo promises kiye hai wo fake kiye hai is tarike se problem aa rahi hai. Unhone kaha ki hamari taraf se koi aisa promise hi nahi karta hai. Maine unko screenshot leke bhej diye jo mail jo unhone mere ko wo diya tha. Mail kiye maine do mere ko jo manager the unke senior jo the unko bhi maine mail kiya ki ye dekhiye aapke bande ne jisne mere ko ye software becha hai jisne mere ko ye kiya hai. Thik hai. Usne mere ko promise kiya hai. To uske baad mein koi jawab hi nahi aur uske baad ek baar mera koi message nahi uthaya, message ka reply nahi kiya, koi call ka reply nahi kiya. To fir kya fayda hua? Bataiye aap mere ko.
Executive: Sir yaha pe na jabhi bhi aapne aise request raise kari ki aapko service discontinue karani hai to dekhiye sir every time aapke paas call gaya hai sir agar aap dekhoge to Samay ne aapko call kiya hai sir Shiv Prakash ne aapko phone kiya hai.
Customer: Madam ye Samay Shiv Prakash ye sab jhoot bol rahe hai.
Customer: Main bata raha hu na aapko. Main to khud pareshan hu.
Customer: Main khud pareshan hu main call nahi uthaunga. Kya baat kar rahe hai aap?
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi sir jabhi bhi aapne complaint kiya hai na sir unhone aapke baad.
Customer: Nahi nahi main bata raha hu na koi call.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Bulk lead chahiye to bulk lead ke sir filters aapko bataye ki kaise aap kar sakte ho. Hai na sir?
Customer: Nahi nahi.
Executive: Dekhiye.
Customer: Mere ko to sab kuch pata hai main kya kar sakta hu. Aapki kya promises the aapne kya provide karwaya aap to ye bataiye na mere ko.
Executive: Sir aap yahi keh rahe hai na ki paisa aapka refund ho jayega agar aapko nahi mila.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Ye yahi keh rahe hai na. To aap aapne request kiya tha sir aap ye keh rahe ho aapne within 60 days aapne aise bola do mahine ke andar aap.
Customer: Request kiya tha. Haan to nahi mila aapko.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To kya bola sir uss time pe sir kyunki main main aapko.
Customer: Unhone kaha ki aisa koi promise hi hamari taraf se nahi kiya gaya hai. Aur jab maine unko screenshot leke bhej diye ki ye aapke bande ne mere ko assign kiya tha. Ye mere unse purchase kiya tha aur ye aap message dekhiye. Uske baad mein koi aaj tak mere ko reply nahi mila uska.
Customer: Unhone kaha thik hai sir hum dekhte hai isko dekhte hai sir. Aur uske baad mein to fir maine hazaro baar mere ko jo manager mila tha kya naam tha wo koi Chaudhary Chaudhary tha. Kya naam tha uska kuch aisa hi tha ek Anju Anju haan Deepak Chaudhary. Ek Anju madam thi pata nahi kaun kaun tha. Kitni hi baar unko maine bataya. Koi Deepak Chaudhary to saala ek baar phone nahi uthata mera. Bataiye wo manager ka kya fayda?
Customer: Jo aadmi phone hi nahi utha raha. Haan.
Executive: Sir main aapki baat samajh rahi hu lekin sir dekhiye ab to.
Customer: Aap kuch nahi samajh rahe main bata raha hu na aap to sirf time pass kar rahe ho. Kuch nahi samajh rahe. Agar samajh rahe hote to mere problem ka solution milta mere ko.
Executive: Sir ab dekhiye main itna hi bol sakti hu ki apne paas dekhiye chaar din mein to aapki service na waise bhi band ho jayegi.
Customer: Nahi ho jane dijiye mujhe kya dikkat hai ho jane dijiye.
Executive: Maine to sir yahi phone kiya aisa ki hum sir se baat karenge aur agle saal ke liye continue karayenge lekin aapne itna bada.
Customer: Continue mera juta kharo main jute aur maru main koi mere se continue karne ke liye kehta hai to.
Executive: Jute aur maru main continue karne ki ummid rakhte hai wo.
Executive: Sir main aapko yahi bolungi ki aapke paas abhi paanch cheh din ka service jo chal raha hai wo aap jitna bhi lead consume kar sakte hai wo aap kar lo bulk wala jab service band ho jayegi tab band ho jayegi.
Customer: Are madam koi fayda nahi hai band ho jane dijiye mere liye waise bhi koi fayda nahi hai.
Executive: Sir abhi na ek dolo mai order ki ek ton ki requirement aayi hui hai.
Customer: Koi baat nahi chhodiye usko. Main ek ton mein deal nahi karta main 25 ton mein 50 ton mein deal karta hu thik hai.
Executive: Haan to ek baar baat to kar lo sir ho sakta hai ye badi bade order.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer had a very bad experience with IndiaMART.

- Fake promises were made during subscription purchase.

- No resolution to issues; leads expire quickly.

- Manager never answers the phone.

- Wants refund as promised during purchase.



Resolution:

- Executive listened to the customer's complaints.

- Executive stated that the service will end in 4 days.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, refund, promises, manager
